All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
Action
The enum class Action represent all the action that influence the model during a game
ActionCharacter
The class ActionCharacter is the class that represent the characters that require an action by the player
ActionRule
The class ActionRule represent the rule active when is activated a card that require an action executed by the player
ActionRuleTest
This class contains the test for the class ActionRule
AddMeMessage
The class AddMeMessage represent the action that add a player in the game, extends the class Message and implement the method execute that apply changes to the game
Bag
The class bag represent the bag of the game, in the bag there are the students implemented as a stack, and there are the methods to get random students from the bag and put them in the bag
BagTest
This class contains the test for the class Bag
BlockColorMessage
The class BlockColorMessage represent the action that block a color in the computation of the influence in the game, extends the class Message and implement the method execute that apply changes to the game
BlockIslandMessage
The class BlockIslandMessage represent the action that block an island in the computation of the influence in the game, extends the class Message and implement the method execute that apply changes to the game
Canteen
the class canteen represent a part of the player dashboard, inside the canteen can be stored students, and can give coins to the players depending by the number of students in it
CanteenTest
This class contains the test for the class Canteen
Card
The class card represent the assistent card, after being inizialized in the first part of the game they only represent an object in the game, so the only methods in the class are getter and an override of equal and tostring
CardTest
This class contains the test for the class Card
Character
The abstract class character is the class inherited by each specific character class, in this class there are the elements common by all classes
CharactersTest
This class contains the test for the Characters cards
CharacterType
This class is an enum representing the different types of character, exist 6 type of character divided by the aspect of the game they change or influence
ChooseColorMessage
ChooseColorMessage is an abstract class that is inherited by class that need to choose a color
ChooseIslandMessage
ChooseIslandMessage is an abstract class that is inherited by class that need to choose an island
Client
This class represent the cli interface for the client
ClientCliApp
This is the entry point to play a CLI-based game.
ClientGUI
This class create the gui for the client to play the game
ClientGuiApp
This is the entry point to play a GUI-based game.
Cloud
The class cloud represent the cloud in the game, the cloud store the student until they are choosen at the end of the turn, a cloud can be full or not, depending if it was already choose in the turn, the most important methods in the class cloud are refill cloud to refill the students in the cloud and choosecloud to permit the player to choose the cloud
CloudTest
This class contains the test for the class Cloud
Color
The enum class Color represent the color of the students
ColorTower
Enum that represent ColorTower, a ColorTower represent a player in the games upon to 3 players and a team in the 4 player game
Columns
This class represent the columns in which is divided the terminal to print things, it implements some methods to help the programmer print text divided in column
CompleteRulesGameTest
This class contains the test for some methods present ony in the complete rule game
Connection
The class connection represent the connection of every socket, it implements the observer pattern and is observed by the private class MessageReceiver in the RemoteView, the role of the class connection is to manage the connection, take the messages sent by the client and notify them
Controller
The calss controller represent the controller of the game in the MVC patter and permit the implementation of the Observer pattern
ControllerExceptionTest
This class test the exceptions thrown of the controller
ControllerTest
This class contains the controller tests
CreditsDialog
This class represent the dialog containing the credits of the game
Dashboard
The class dashboard represent the dashboard of the player, so inside the class are stored the graveyard (last ccard played) the canteen, the entrance, the towers and the color of tha player who owns the dashboard, the class dashboard is a way to unify all this elements in the game so is method are principally setter and getter
DashboardTest
This class contains the test for the class Dashboard
DecoratedRule
The class DecoratedRule is inherited by all the Rules that are not the DefaultRules and that modify the behaviour of some aspects of the game, in particular reimplement (override) the methods of the interface Rule
DefaultRule
The class DefaultRule represent the rule when there are no character cards active, so the methods of the interface rule implemented represent the default rule of the normal game
DefaultRuleTest
This class contains the test for the class DefaultRule
Entrance
The class entrance represent the entrance inside the dashboard, in the entrance can be stored students and implements the class movable to add or remove students from it
EntranceTest
This class contains the test for the class Entrance
ExchangeCharacter
The class ExchangeCharacter is the class that represent the characters that enable exchange movements
ExchangeRule
The class ExchangeRule represent the rule active when is activated a card that require to enable exchanging
ExchangeRuleTest
This class contains the test for the class ExchangeRule
ExchangeStudentMessage
The class ExchangeStudentMessage represent the action that exchange students in the game, extends the class Message and implement the method execute that apply changes to the game
FactoryBag
The class bag is a class that permit to implement the factory pattern, it is called at the beginning of the game to create the bag, it can create two different bag, the initbag is used to place students at the beginning of the game in the islands because are two per color, bag is the normal bag used during the game with 24 students per color
FactoryBagTest
This class contains the test for the class FactoryBag
Game
Game is the central class of the model, inside game are present of the method neccessary to alter the model, and all the entities that represent the game, it is an observable due to the utilization of the observer pattern, when a part of the game is modified a notify is sent
GameHandler
The class Gamehandler is the core of the controller, its role is to manage the turn in the game, the current player, the legit action for each player and phase, the game is divided in phases, every phase has a set of permitted action, if the action is permitted and the sender of the action is the current player the method execute is call, execute is a method inside every message that modify the game, execute return an object called update that permit the gamehandler to refresh the state of the GameHandler (turn, phase)
GameHandlerTest
This class contains the GameHandler test
GameManager
The class GameManager manages the games of the server, its role is to associate all the classes of the Observer pattern and to create the game with specific number of players and rules and add players to them
GameReport
The class GameReport represent an object containing the state of the game, so is a class principally made of attributes and getters
GameTest
This class contains the test for the class Game
GUIConnection
This class builds the Java Swing window to let the player insert the server's address and port
GUIEntry
This class is the object that represent the window that permit the player to join a game
GUIGame
This class is the object that represent the window that contain the game to play
Hand
The class hand represent the hand of a player, inside this class are stored all the card remaining to the player, the principal methods in the class are a getter of all the cards and a method that permit to play a card
HandTest
This class contains the test for the class Hand
IllegalActionException
This class is the exception thrown when a player try to do an action not permitted in a part of the turn
IllegalMoveException
The class IllegalMoveException represent the exception thrown when an action is not permitted
InfluenceCharacter
The class InfluenceCharacter is the class that represent the characters that modify the computation of the influence
InfluenceRule
The class InfluenceRule represent the rule active when is activated a card that modify the influence computation
InfluenceRuleTest
This class contains the test for the class InfluenceRule
Island
The class island represent an island in the game, in the island can be stored students, and can be present a different number of towers, an island ccan have an owner if a player conquer it through the rule game
IslandInfluenceMessage
The class IslandInfluenceMessage represent the action that compute the influence of an island without moving mother nature, extends the class Message and implement the method execute that apply changes to the game
IslandTest
This class contains the test for the class Island
JSONCharacter
This class represent a character and is used to store the characters attributes after being extracted from the JSON.
JSONParams
This class is used to store the parameters of the different characters cards taken from a JSON file.
Location
The enum class Location contains all the location to which is possible move pawns in the game
Message
Message is an abstract class that every kind of message extend to represent different actions
MessageTest
This class test the class Message an all his heirs
ModelExceptionTest
This class contains the test for all the exceptions in the model
MotherNature
The class MotherNature represent the entity mother nature in the game, so have an attribute to show her position and some method to get and set her position
MotherNatureCharacter
The class MotherNatureCharacter is the class that represent the characters that modify the behaviour of mother nature
MotherNatureRule
The class MotherNatureRule represent the rule active when is activated a card that modify the movement of mother nature
MotherNatureRuleTest
This class contains the test for the class MotherNatureRule
MotherNatureTest
This class contains the test for the class MotherNature
Movable
Interface that represent the ability of a class to move student, so if a class want to move student have to implement this interface
MovementCharacter
The class MovementCharacter is the class that represent the characters that require to make movements in their power
MovementMessage
The class MovementMessage is an abstract class that owns some methods used in the messages where there are movement or exchanges of the pawns
MoveMotherNatureMessage
The class MoveMotherNatureMessage represent the action that move mother nature in the game, extends the class Message and implement the method execute that apply changes to the game
MoveStudentMessage
The class MoveStudentMessage represent the action that move a student in the game, extends the class Message and implement the method execute that apply changes to the game
NoActiveCardException
The class NoActiveCardException represent the exception thrown when a card is not active and the player is trying to use his power
NoCharacterSelectedException
The class NoCharacterSelectedException represent the exception thrown when in the method usePower the index assume a wrong value
NoContiguousIslandException
The class NoContiguousIslandException represent the exception thrown when is called the method merge island in two islands that are not contiguous
NoIslandException
The class NoIslandException represent the exception thrown when there is not an island with a specific id
NoMoreStudentsException
The class NoMoreStudentException represent the exception thrown when a method tries to extract one or more students from the bag but there are no students left
NoPlayerException
The class NoPlayerException represent the exception thrown when a method doesn't found a player with a specific nickname
Observable<T>
The class Observable is on of the two principal component of the Observer Pattern, is the class that managed the observables objects and provide the methods to add observers and notify the observers, this class is implemented by the observables
Observer<T>
This interface is part of the Observer pattern, is implemented by the Observer classes
OpponentDialog
This class represent the dialog containing the board of the other player
OverflowCardException
The class OverflowCardException represent the exception thrown when a player tries to use an assistant card not in the hand
PageDialog
This class represent the dialog containing the board of the other player
Phase
The enum class Phase contains the phase in which every turn is divided, in the gamehandler are defined all the actions legit in each phase
PingMessage
The class PingMessage is used to send frequent messages to check if the connection is still up
PlayCardMessage
The class PlayCardMessage represent the action that play an assistant card in the game, extends the class Message and implement the method execute that apply changes to the game
Player
The class player represent the player in the game, so its attribute are an hand, a dashboard, a nickname and a coin the methods in the class are getter to access to its attribute and methods to modify the number of coins of the player
PlayerTest
This class contains the test for the class Player
ProfessorCharacter
The class ProfessorCharacter is the class that represent the characters that modify the computation of the possession of the professor
ProfessorRule
The class ProfessorRule represent the rule active when is activated a card that modify the computation of the professors
ProfessorRuleTest
This class contains the test for the class professorRule
PutBackMessage
The class PutBackMessage represent the action that put back in the bag some students (according the rule) of a color, extends the class Message and implement the method execute that apply changes to the game
RemoteView
This class represent the view in the server, it inherits the class view
Report
The report class represent the situation present of an island and permit the computation of the influence, to represent the situation of the island the report have the attributes to represent the owner of an island, the number of tower, the students for each color, and the extra point for a ColorTower due to the activation of a character card
ReportTest
This class contains the test for the class Report
Rule
The interface Rule has to be implemented by every Rule class, it assures the implementation of the methods calculateInfluence, updateProfessor, isActionNeeded, getMotherNatureExtraMovement, getMaximumExchangeMoves, exists different type of rules depending on the current active CharacterCard, and this methods cover the aspects that change in the game if a different card is active
RulesDialog
This class represent the dialog containing the rules of the game
ScalingUtils
This class contains some methods to help in the gui construction, these methods principally scale the objects in the gui
SelectCloudMessage
The class SelectCloudMessage represent the action that select a cloud and give to the player the students in that cloud, extends the class Message and implement the method execute that apply changes to the game
Server
The class Server represents the server of the application, this class manage new socket connection using the class gameManager and Connection
ServerApp
This is the entry point to play a CLI-based game.
Student
The class Student represent the student pawn in the game, the attribute of the class are id to identify the student, the color, and the sprite, the methods of the class are principally getter and an override of the method equals and toString
StudentTest
This class contains the test for the class Student
Update
The class update id an object returned to the controller after every execution of a command received by the players, it present the state of the game to the controller, is principally a class made of attribute and getter all the getter return an optional value to manage better null values.
UsePowerMessage
The class UsePowerMessage represent the action that use a power of on of the character card, extends the class Message and implement the method execute that apply changes to the game
View
This class represent the View in the model view controller pattern, it extends the observable and ia also an observer because the view is observed by the controller and observer the game
